step1.subtext1: Please be a as precise as possible
step1.subtext2: Some basic information about your company, for receipts, contact etc.

companyIdNo.label: Please enter your company identification no
companyIdNo.validation: Company Identification no is a required field

companyName.label: Please enter your company name
companyName.validation: Company name is a required field

companyName2.label: Please enter your company name 2 (optional)
companyName2.validation: Company Name 2 is a required field

address1.label: Please enter the street address of your company headquarters

address2.label: Please enter the street address of your company headquarters

streetNumber.label: Please enter the street number of your company headquarters
streetNumber.validation: Street number is a required field

postOffice.label: (optional) Please enter your post office box number of your organisation

zipCode.label: Please enter the zip code of your company headquarters

city.label: Please enter the city of your company headquarters

country.label: Please enter the country of your company headquarters

step2.subtext1: This person will be the administrator of the account.
step2.subtext2: You can add additional users to your company after the registration.

email.label: Please enter the e-mail address of the company owner

confirmPassword.label: Confirm your password (6-24 characters)
confirmPassword.validation1: Confirm password is a required field

firstName.label: Please enter the first name of the company owner
firstName.validation: First name is a required field

lastName.label: Please enter the last name of the company owner
lastName.validation: Last name is a required field

step3.subtext1: This person will be the administrator of the account.
step3.subtext2: Please enter some additional information, in order to be able to deliver the best service for your company

companyWebsite.label: Your main domain on the web
companyWebsite.validation: Company website is a required field

employeeCount.label: How many employees does your company have
employeeCount.validation: Company employee count is a required field

existSince.label: How long is your company registered?
existSince.validation: Company exists since is a required field

turnOver.label: How much revenue does your company earn on a yearly basis?
turnOver.validation: Company gross turnover per year is a required field

businessType.label: Which business types does your company offer
businessType.validation: Company business types is a required field

companyLanguage.label: This will be the user-interface language and that product input also occurs in the selected language.
companyLanguage.validation: Company language is a required field

acceptTerms.placeholder: I have read and accept the
acceptTerms.label: terms and conditions
acceptTerms.validation: You must accept the terms and conditions
